name: umbrellaLORA
description:
English:

I created this LORA to reproduce images of transparent umbrellas, as I was having difficulty generating images with an umbrella, I believe that with this LORA it made it a little easier

Use with a weight of 0.8 and below

Português: Criei este LORA para reproduzir imagens de guarda chuvas transparentes, pois estava tendo dificuldade para gerar imagens com guarda chuva, acredito que com esse LORA facilitou um pouco

Use com o peso de 0.8 para baixo

meta.prompt: <lora:umbrellaLORA:0.4>, (masterpiece:1.2), (best_quality:1.2), (ultra_detailed:1.3), 8k, extremely_clear, realism, (ultrarealistic:1.3), Generate an image of a cute albino girl standing in a cyberpunk city at night while it rains. She is holding a transparent umbrella and wearing a white robotic outfit with some parts showing. The outfit should have lights and neons, and the girl should have a playful expression on her face
meta.negativePrompt: ((nsfw)), (handbag:1.2), (bag:1.1), (purse:1.2), ((veil)), (((text))), ((hood)), ((cap)), ((cleat)), ((((two heads)))), (black and white), ((repeat)) disfigured,kitsch,oversaturated,greain,low-res,Deformed,blurry,bad anatomy,disfigured,poorly drawn face,mutation,mutated,extra limb,ugly,poorly drawn hands,missing limb,blurry,floating limbs, disconnected limbs,malformed hands,blur,out of focus,long neck,long body,ugly,disgusting,poorly drawn,childish,mutilated,mangled,old,surreal,lowres, bad anatomy, error body, error hair,,error arm, error hands, bad hands, error fingers, bad fingers, missing fingers, error legs, bad legs,multiple legs,missing legs, error lighting, error shadow, error reflection, text, error, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, error eyes, bug eyes,bad eyes, bad mouth, error mouth, error face,ugly
